issue.title: [C++] Create dataset writer to encapsulate dataset writer logic
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13650](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13650). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current dataset writing logic is insufficient (ARROW-12321, ARROW-13590, ARROW-10439, ARROW-12803).  This PR moves the logic into a dedicated file and addresses the issues, mainly adding back pressure and size limits.
